about_the_game:
"MUGEN Avatar Dress Girls version" is an application that can automatically create avatars of cute girls with one click of a button.

The avatars you make can be exported in VRM format.
The exported avatars can be used in VRM-compatible metaverse.

Go Metaverse!


The avatars you create can be exported in VRM format.
◆The avatars can be used on Metaverse platforms such as "Virtual Cast" and "cluster".
*Please follow the avatar usage conditions of each metaverse platform.
Can also be used with VRM-compatible games and applications.

Auto-generated!


**Avatar + One Piece"… Generate avatar and dress texture(VRoid-one piece) at the same time.

**Avatar only"…Generate avatar without changing dress texture(VRoid-one piece).

**One Piece" only…Generate dress texture (VRoid-one piece) without changing the avatar.

Edit parameters


You can easily edit the auto-generated avatar with several slider bars, such as body shape, eye color, skin color, with or without contour lines and more.

Need more options?

Need more dress?

▼Dress Maker▼


▼Dress Maker Pro▼

Do you wanna add "kawaii" items on your VRM？
【ItemShop】NOW ON SALE!




Check it out!

The avatars you make can be exported in VRM format.
The exported avatars can be used in VRM-compatible metaverse.

◆The avatars can be used on Metaverse platforms such as "Virtual Cast" and "cluster".

name: MUGEN Avatar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700
  • Graphics: NVIDIA　GeForce GTX 1070 同等以上
  • Additional Notes: Tested in this environment.
